name: Zombie Grocery
description:
A 2D top-down perspective comedic cartoony game, set in a zombie infested supermarket. Your goal is to collect groceries while avoiding death. To obtain goods you strategically move around the store and go near shelves then pick up the item, whilst avoiding being slain by different kinds of evil zombies. It is also possible to kill zombies, by using game elements for that. One example would be to pull a lever, which drops a box from the top of a shelf, to land it on top of a zombie to kill it. Game also has sound effects.
